少女: girl (usu. between 7 and 17), young lady, female between 17 and 20 years old (ritsuryō period)
崩れる: to collapse, to crumble, to get out of shape
結ぶ: to tie, to bind, to link
幾ら: how much, something over, and something
夜更かし: staying up late, sitting up late at night, keeping late hours
其処で: so, accordingly, now, then, thereupon, therefore
阻む: to keep someone from doing, to stop, to prevent
偏る: to lean (to one side), to incline, to be unbalanced (e.g. diet)
遮る: to interrupt, to obstruct (a view, someone's way, etc.), to block (light, wind, etc.)
一寸: a little, a bit, slightly; just a minute, for a moment, briefly; somewhat, rather, fairly, pretty, quite; (not) easily, (not) readily; hey!, come on, excuse me; thanks, but no, not feasible, not possible
食べる: to eat, to live on (e.g. a salary), to live off
鼻先: tip of nose, before one's eyes, under one's nose
蒔く: to sow, to plant, to seed
縮める: to shorten, to reduce, to condense
絞る: to wring (towel, rag), to squeeze, to squeeze (fruit to extract juice)
紅葉: maple (tree), red leaves (of autumn), autumn colors
引く: to pull, to tug, to lead (e.g. a horse)
尋ねる: to ask, to enquire, to inquire
求める: to want, to wish for, to request
